entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry's friend Ron compares Harry's thoughts to Hermione's.
Ron is concerned that Harry might run into Filch while sneaking around at night.
Ron is also concerned that Harry might run into Snape while sneaking around at night.
Ron is concerned that Harry might run into Mrs Norris, Filch's cat, while sneaking around at night.
